input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with the latest invoice

I recently got an invoice with unfamiliar charges. After reviewing the invoice and my product subscriptions, I am still puzzled about the inaccuracies. I think it could be due to incorrect product bundles or outdated pricing My name is David Kim.. Could you please investigate this? I would be grateful if you could give me a detailed explanation for the charges. If you need any further information from me, please let me know You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. I look forward to your response.
